verses.text: <a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-1/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-2/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-3/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-4/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-5/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
6 "JESUS_END"Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-7/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-8/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-9/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-10/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-11/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-12/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
13 "JESUS_END"And to esteem them very highly in love for their work's sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
14 "JESUS_END"Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
15 "JESUS_END"See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-16/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"Rejoice evermore.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-17/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"Pray without ceasing.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-18/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-19/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"Quench not the Spirit.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-20/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"Despise not prophesyings.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-21/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21  "JESUS_END"Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-22/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22  "JESUS_END"Abstain from all appearance of evil.
23 "JESUS_END"And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
24 "JESUS_END"Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-25/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25  "JESUS_END"Brethren, pray for us.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-26/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26  "JESUS_END"Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-27/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27  "JESUS_END"I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
28 "JESUS_END"The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen. (The first epistle to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.)
